auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in
auth.resetPasswordSubtext: We will send you an email with the link to reset your password. Enter the email associated with your account.
auth.emailConfirmation: We will send you an email to confirm your account
auth.termsAndConditions: By selecting Accept and continue, I accept the Terms and conditions and Privacy policy of Goldenbook.
auth.promotionalEmails: Goldenbook will send you push notifications and promotional emails with the most relevant recommendations and exclusive seasonal offers. You can unsubscribe at any moment.
auth.noCommercialMessages: I don't wish to receive commercial messages by Goldenbook

slide1.description: Our partners are carefully selected so you don't miss any hidden gem.

slide2.subtitle: TAILORED TO YOU

slide3.subtitle: DETAILED AND UP TO DATE
slide3.title: Everything you need in one place
slide3.description: Find updated information about all of our prime suggestions.
